fields.name: name

fields.description: Display name for the category (e.g., 'Navigation Systems')

fields.label: Tag Name
fields.description: Display name for the tag (e.g., 'Radar Technology')

fields.label: Usage Count
fields.description: Automatic count of tag usage (computed field)

fields.name: description
fields.label: Company Description
fields.description: Detailed description of the company and their services
